text: Robert Anthony Fish (born October 27, 1976) is an American professional wrestler currently performing for Major League Wrestling (MLW). He is best known for his time in Ring of Honor (ROH), WWE (where he performed on the NXT brand), and All Elite Wrestling (AEW). While working in WWE, Fish was a part of the stable The Undisputed Era with Adam Cole, Kyle O'Reilly and Roderick Strong. Fish and O'Reilly, who teamed under the name ReDRagon in ROH, were tag team champions several times. == Championships and accomplishments == * High Risk Wrestling ** HRW Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Kyle O'Reilly * New England Championship Wrestling ** NECW Heavyweight Championship (1 time) * New Japan Pro-Wrestling ** IWGP Junior Heavyweight Tag Team Championship (2 times) – with Kyle O'Reilly ** Super Jr. Tag Tournament (2014) – with Kyle O'Reilly * Pro Wrestling Illustrated ** Tag Team of the Year (2019) – with Kyle O'Reilly ** Ranked No. 26 of the top 500 singles wrestlers in the PWI 500 in 2016 * Pro Wrestling Noah ** NTV G+ Cup Jr. Heavyweight Tag League Fighting Spirit Award (2012) – with Eddie EdwardsNTV G+ Cup Jr. Heavyweight Tag League at purolove.com retrieved on September 29, 2018 * Pro Wrestling Unscripted ** PWU Tag Team Champion (1 time) – with Scott Cardinal * Ring of Honor ** ROH World Tag Team Championship (3 times) – with Kyle O'Reilly ** ROH World Television Championship (1 time) ** ROH World Television Championship #1 Contender Tournament (2015) ** Tag Wars Tournament (2014) – with Kyle O'Reilly ** Survival of the Fittest (2016) * Upstate Pro Wrestling ** UPW Heavyweight Championship (1 time) ** UPW World Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Brandon Cutler * WWE ** NXT Tag Team Championship (2 times) – with Kyle O'Reilly, Adam Cole and Roderick Strong (1), Kyle O'Reilly (1) ** NXT Year-End Award (2 times) *** Tag Team of the Year **** 2019 – with Kyle O'Reilly **** 2020 – with Kyle O'Reilly, Adam Cole and Roderick Strong ==
